globalPricingSettingsDescription: Set default prices for services. These can be overridden at the item level.
pricingHierarchyInfoDesc: Item-specific prices (set when adding/editing dormitories or halls) will override these global defaults. If an item-specific price is not set, the global default will be used. For services like catering, these global prices apply directly per person per day.

homePageWelcomeMessage: Baga Gara Giddugala Qorannofi Leenjii Barnoota Oromiyaa Dhuftan
discoverMoreSubtitle: Scan the QR code below to view our digital brochure and learn more about our services, facilities, and commitment to excellence.
faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and booking process.
faqQ1Title: How do I book a dormitory room?
faqQ1Answer: Navigate to the 'Dormitories' page, select your desired dates to check availability, choose a room, and fill out the booking form. Payment instructions will be provided upon submission.
faqQ2Title: What payment methods are accepted for dormitory bookings?
faqQ2Answer: Currently, we accept direct bank transfers for dormitory bookings. After submitting your booking request, you'll receive bank account details and instructions to complete your payment. You'll then need to send proof of payment via our Telegram bot for verification.
faqQ3Title: How do companies book halls or sections?
faqQ3Answer: Companies must first register through the 'Register Company' link. Once approved, company representatives can log in, navigate to the 'Halls & Sections' page, select facilities and dates, specify service requirements, and submit the booking. An agreement will be generated upon approval.
faqQ4Title: Are there catering services available for hall/section bookings?
faqQ4Answer: Yes, we offer different levels of lunch and refreshment services. You can select your preferred service level during the facility booking process. Costs are calculated per person per day.
faqQ5Title: What is the process after booking a facility as a company?
faqQ5Answer: After your facility booking request is submitted, it will be reviewed by our administration. Upon approval, a rental agreement will be prepared and sent to you. You will need to sign this agreement and upload it. Payment will also be requested as per the agreement terms.
faqQ6Title: Can I check my dormitory booking status online?
faqQ6Answer: Yes, individual users can check their active, approved dormitory booking status using the 'My Dormitory' link in the navigation. You'll need to enter the phone number used during booking.
faqQ7Title: Who should I contact for support or more information?
faqQ7Answer: Please visit our 'Contact Us' page for details on how to reach our building administrators or for general inquiries. You can also use the live chat widget on our website during working hours.
contactUsSubtitle: We're here to help! Reach out to us through any of the channels below.
contactBuildingAdminsDesc: For specific inquiries related to dormitory rooms within these buildings.
generalInquiriesDesc: For hall/section bookings, company registrations, and other general questions.
googleMapsEmbedTitle: Location of Oromia Education Research and Training Center on Google Maps
mapEmbedNote: Use the map to get directions to our center. We look forward to welcoming you!
brochureDormitoriesDesc: Well-maintained and secure dormitory rooms for individuals, equipped with essential amenities for a pleasant stay.
brochureHallsDesc: Spacious halls and flexible sections suitable for conferences, workshops, meetings, and various events, with customizable setups.
brochureCateringDesc: Delicious and diverse catering options, from refreshments to full lunch services, tailored to meet your event's needs.
brochureSubtitle: Your premier destination for comfortable lodging and versatile event spaces in {siteName}.
brochureAboutUsContent: Welcome to {siteName}, a leading provider of quality accommodation and facility rental services. We are dedicated to offering a seamless booking experience, comfortable stays, and well-equipped spaces for all your training, workshop, and meeting needs. Our commitment is to ensure your satisfaction through excellent service and modern amenities.
brochureKeyFeaturesMore: And many more amenities designed for your comfort and convenience.
brochureWhyChooseExcellentService: Dedicated staff and excellent customer service.
brochureWhyChooseCommitmentToQuality: Commitment to quality and guest satisfaction.
brochureCallToActionTitle: Get in Touch or Book Today!
brochureCallToActionDesc: Ready to book or need more information? Our team is here to assist you. Contact us via phone, email, or visit our center.

termsPlaceholder1: 1. Payment: Full payment is due upon signing this agreement unless otherwise specified. Late payments may incur penalties.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Cancellation: Cancellations made less than 7 days prior to the booking start date may be subject to a cancellation fee of 50% of the total booking cost. Cancellations within 48 hours are non-refundable.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. Use of Facility: The client agrees to use the facility only for the purpose stated in the booking and shall not cause any damage. Any damages will be billed to the client.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. Liability: {siteName} is not responsible for any loss or damage to personal property of the client or attendees. The client is responsible for the conduct of their attendees.
